title: They Want To Burn It All Down (Ep 1798)
description:
The video clips of liberal attacks on democracy, after the Supreme Court’s Roe ruling, are a must-see. In this episode, I address the dangerous path we’re on, and how to correct it. 

News Picks:


Merrick Garland's DOJ Is A Threat To The Republic.


Troubling calls for Clarence Thomas’ assassination spread across social media after Roe reversed.


Adam Schiff says he has “evidence” again.


Gina Carano speaks out about attempts to cancel her. 

Are You Telling People To Break The Law?’: MSNBC Host Presses CA Lt. Gov. On Calls To ‘Defy’ SCOTUS.

New York Times complains that Big Tech may censor less "election misinformation" during the 2022 midterms.
